content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

###Copper Mining and Smelting Setup at (-28, -61)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0, -61.0)
- Wooden chest at (-27.5, -59.5)
- Burner inserter at (-26.5, -59.5) moving items from chest to furnace
- Stone furnace at (-25.0, -59.0)
- Burner inserter at (-23.5, -58.5) moving items to output chest
- Output chest at (-22.5, -58.5) containing copper and iron plates

###Power Generation Setup at (-4.5, 16.0)
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at (-3.5, 27.5) providing water
- Boiler at (-4.5, 16.0) converting water to steam
- Steam engine at (-4.5, 12.5)
- Connected pipe networks for water and steam transport
- Multiple electricity poles forming power network (id=6590)

###Automation Science Pack Production at (8.5, 13.5)
Consists of:
- Input chest for copper plates at (6.5, 14.5)
- Input chest for iron gear wheels at (8.5, 10.5)
- Burner inserter at (6.5, 13.5) moving copper plates
- Burner inserter at (8.5, 11.5) moving iron gear wheels
- Assembling machine at (8.5, 13.5)
- Burner inserter at (10.5, 13.5) for output
- Output chest at (11.5, 13.5)

###Inactive/Broken Structures
- Burner mining drill at (41.0, -82.0) - out of fuel
- Burner mining drill at (-18.0, -53.0) - out of fuel
- Stone furnace at (-15.0, -51.0) - no ingredients
- Stone furnace at (14.0, 14.0) - no ingredients

ERROR TIPS

###Fuel Management Errors
- Keep mining drills fueled to maintain continuous operation
- Monitor fuel levels in burner inserters and mining drills regularly

###Power Network Issues
- Ensure all electrical machines are connected to the power network
- Verify steam engine has adequate steam supply from boilers
- Check that boilers have both fuel and water supply

###Production Line Setup Errors
- Verify correct inserter placement and orientation before attempting to move items
- Ensure inserters are configured with correct pickup and drop positions
- Check that all required ingredients are available in input chests before starting production

###Inventory Management
- Verify required items are in inventory before attempting placement or insertion
- Keep track of copper plate and iron gear wheel supplies for automation science pack production

###Entity Placement
- Check available inventory before attempting to place entities
- Ensure target position is clear before placing new entities
